Text:
Thank you from the bottom of my heart for doing this TDMK1!
It is an absolute life saver for everyone of us that can't watch the BBC and their awesome coverage by any other means!
I really appreciate how you upload the forum aswell. It is just a professional coverage through and through.
Thank you!

Ehm, I don't think pirate bay displays comments in a deterministic fashion. My comment above was visible for a while and then hidden.
Just in case of another IT messup I just wanted to say many, many sincere thanks to tdmk1! You are a hero!
This is the first time I've seen the forum - I've always wondered about what it was like.  Thanks for your F1 uploads, TDMK1.  As someone else said - you are a lifesaver!
Thanks very much for this !! Your doing an awesome job !
I just adore whole BBC F1 coverage from first to the last minute. That means F1 Forum also. TDMK1 thank you very very much.
